name: RAYSLAYER
description:
RAYSLAYER is a DOOM/Wolfenstein-like game where your goal is to kill as many enemies as you can before dying.

 This game features an infinite amount of waves of enemies to kill, ammo and heath pickups that spawn around the map, a kill counter, as well as an amazing soundtrack that fits the mood of the game.

CONTROLS: 

  • Move: WASD 
  • Look: Mouse 
  • Shoot: Left Click
  • Toggle Crosshair: C 
  • Decrease/Increase FOV: -/= 
  • Toggle Framerate Display: F1
  •  Go To Menu: ESC

This game was made in UPBGE 0.30
